titles.title: A bill to improve the transition between experimental permits and commercial licenses for commercial reusable launch vehicles.
A bill to improve the transition between experimental permits and commercial licenses for commercial reusable launch vehicles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Amends commercial space launch licensing requirements.
Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue an experimental permit for a particular reusable suborbital rocket (as under current law) or rocket design after a license has been issued for the launch or reentry of a rocket of that design. Declares that any permits already issued shall remain valid for research and development and other specified purposes.
